{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16660v1", "title": "Five Specific Cases of the Simple Equations Method (SEsM)", "summary": "We discuss the Simple Equations Method (SEsM) for obtaining exact solutions
of nonlinear partial differential equations. We show that the Jacobi Elliptic
Function Expansion Method, F-Expansion method, Modified Simple Equation method,
Trial Function Method, General Projective Riccati Equations Method and the
First Integral Method are specific cases of SEsM.", "main_category": "nlin.SI", "categories": "nlin.SI", "published": "2025-04-23T12:26:53Z"}
